verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, <S%H834>when<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>people<s%> were <S%H8552>clean<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H3947>Take<s%> you <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H582>men<s%> out of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> out of every <S%H7626>tribe<s%> a <S%H376>man,<s%>

And <S%H6680>command<s%> you them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5375>Take<s%> you <S%H2088>hence<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> out of the place where the <S%H3548>priests'<s%> <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H4673>stood<s%> <S%H3559>firm,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and you shall <S%H5674>carry<s%> them <S%H5674>over<s%> with you, and <S%H5117>leave<s%> them in the <S%H4411>lodging<s%> place, <S%H834>where<s%> you shall <S%H3885>lodge<s%> this <S%H3915>night.<s%>

Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he had <S%H3559>prepared<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> out of every <S%H7626>tribe<s%> a <S%H376>man:<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H5674>Pass<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and <S%H7311>take<s%> you up every <S%H376>man<s%> of you a <S%H68>stone<s%> on his <S%H7926>shoulder,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%>

That <S%H2063>this<s%> may be a <S%H226>sign<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you, that <S%H3588>when<s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H7592>ask<s%> their fathers in <S%H4279>time<s%> to <S%H4279>come,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> mean you by <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H68>stones?<s%>

Then you shall <S%H559>answer<s%> them, That the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> were <S%H3772>cut<s%> off <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> when it <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> were <S%H3772>cut<s%> off: and <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> shall be for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> as <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> up <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5674>carried<s%> them <S%H5674>over<s%> with them to the place <S%H413>where<s%> they <S%H4411>lodged,<s%> and <S%H3240>laid<s%> them down <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6965>set<s%> up <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> in the place where the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> which <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H4673>stood:<s%> and they are <S%H8033>there<s%> to <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

For the <S%H3548>priests<s%> which <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> was <S%H8552>finished<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H4116>hurried<s%> and <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, <S%H834>when<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H8552>clean<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over,<s%> that the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H2571>armed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to them:

About <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2502>prepared<s%> for <S%H6635>war<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> to the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

On that <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1431>magnified<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and they <S%H3372>feared<s%> him, as they <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H2416>life.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H6680>Command<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> that they <S%H5927>come<s%> up out of <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>
<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> therefore <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5927>Come<s%> you up out of <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> were <S%H5927>come<s%> up out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests'<s%> <S%H7272>feet<s%> were <S%H5423>lifted<s%> up to the <S%H2724>dry<s%> land, that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to their <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H3212>flowed<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1415>banks,<s%> as they did <S%H8543>before.<s%> <S%H8032><s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up out of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> on the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> in the <S%H4217>east<s%> <S%H7097>border<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

And <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H3947>took<s%> out of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> did <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6965>pitch<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal.<s%>

And he <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H834>When<s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%> shall <S%H7592>ask<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%> in <S%H4279>time<s%> to <S%H4279>come,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> mean <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H68>stones?<s%>

Then you shall let your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H3045>know,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5674>came<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> on <S%H3004>dry<s%> land.

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3001>dried<s%> up the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you, <S%H5704>until<s%> you were <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over,<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H3001>dried<s%> up from <S%H6440>before<s%> us, <S%H5704>until<s%> we were <S%H5674>gone<s%> <S%H5674>over:<s%>

That <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> might <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that it is <S%H2389>mighty:<s%> that you might <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H3605>ever.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>
